software.description:
The LONI Provenance Editor (http://www.loni.usc.edu/Software/Provena...) is a self-contained, platform-independent application that automatically extracts the provenance information from an image header (such as a DICOM image) and generates a data provenance XML file with that information.

Provenance Editor is distributed by the Laboratory of Neuro Imaging (http://www.LONI.usc.edu/Software/Provena...) at USC.
